Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 487-496 et pl. XXI.
